title: Remove templatization of PyTypeObject in THP copy storage methods.
body_html:
An in-progress refactoring of THStorage is collapsing the types of THStorages to not be ScalarType-specific.

The relevant PyTypeObject to use for the THPStorageType is currently templatized based on the current THStorage type; this doesn't work if the ScalarType is collapsed. Instead, just pass it explicitly.
body_text:
An in-progress refactoring of THStorage is collapsing the types of THStorages to not be ScalarType-specific.
The relevant PyTypeObject to use for the THPStorageType is currently templatized based on the current THStorage type; this doesn't work if the ScalarType is collapsed.  Instead, just pass it explicitly.
body:
An in-progress refactoring of THStorage is collapsing the types of THStorages to not be ScalarType-specific.

The relevant PyTypeObject to use for the THPStorageType is currently templatized based on the current THStorage type; this doesn't work if the ScalarType is collapsed.  Instead, just pass it explicitly.
